abstract: A new documentary tracks what happens when the offspring of an anonymous sperm donor have the opportunity to meet their biological father.
snippet: A new documentary tracks what happens when the offspring of an anonymous sperm donor have the opportunity to meet their biological father.
lead_paragraph: In November 2005, I wrote an article about two teenage girls, raised in different families, who discovered they are the genetic children of the same sperm donor. The girls, JoEllen Marsh and Danielle Pagano, met through the Donor Sibling Registry, a Web site that has connected thousands of half-siblings conceived through donor insemination.

headline.main: Getting to Know a Sperm-Donor Dad
